name: Quadriped Arm and Leg Raise
how_to_perform:
# Quadriped Arm and Leg Raise Instructions
1. Start by getting into a quadruped position, with your hands under your shoulders and your knees on the ground.
2. Engage your core and place your weight evenly on both of your hands and feet.
3. Slowly raise one arm off the ground while simultaneously raising one leg up towards the ceiling.
4. Keep your raised arm extended and your raised leg straight.
5. Pause briefly at the top of the movement.
6. Slowly lower your raised arm and leg back down to the starting position.
7. Repeat on the other side by raising your opposite arm and leg.
short_summary: Quadriped Arm and Leg Raise is an exercise that primarily targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.
